title: Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Transport (Tour Operators and 

Travel Agents) Act 1982 (Disbursements from Fund) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited transport (tour operator travel agents) act 1982 (disbursements fund) regulation 2020

title: Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations
heading: In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations - 

“Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection with the virus SARSCoV-2 and specified as an infectious disease in accordance with 
Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 
1982 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) or any variant of the disease so specified as 
an infectious disease in those Regulations; 

“refund credit note” means, subject to Regulation 4, any voucher, coupon 
or other document or instrument, including in electronic form, issued by 
a tour operator or travel agent to a customer in respect of the cancellation, 
due to Covid-19, of an overseas travel contract.
text_norm: 2 regulation - covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sarscov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1982 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation refund credit note mean subject regulation 4 voucher coupon document instrument including electronic form issued tour operator travel agent customer respect cancellation due covid-19 overseas travel contract

title: Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations
heading: 3. Payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a refund
text_raw:
3. Payments from the Fund may be made to a customer who holds a refund 
credit note where the tour operator or travel agent who issued the refund credit 
note is unable or fails to meet the financial or contractual obligations owed to 
the customer by the tour operator or travel agent pursuant to the refund credit 
note concerned.
text_norm: 3 payment fund may made customer hold refund credit note tour operator travel agent issued refund credit note unable fails meet financial contractual obligation owed customer tour operator travel agent pursuant refund credit note concerned

title: Regulation 6 of, and the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations
heading: 4. A refund credit note is not a voucher, trading stamp or token within the
text_raw:
4. A refund credit note is not a voucher, trading stamp or token within the 
meaning of Regulation 15 of the Transport (Tour Operators and Travel Agents) 
Act, 1982 (Claims by Customers) Regulations 1983 (S.I. No.104 of 1983) and 
the said Regulation 15 shall not apply to a refund credit note. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [218] 3

 Minister for Transport, Tourism,
